definition: railtrack connection/to integrate into sth/to dock/to connect/to be in step with/to bring into line with/to align
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: It is an international dental clinic with a wide range of stomatological therapy.
sentences.chinese: 是一家与国际接轨的齿科全科诊所。

sentences.english: To integrate with the international practice, BOQ should be adopted for valuation in China.
sentences.chinese: 实行工程量清单计价是与国际惯例接轨的要求。

sentences.english: IDG News Service — North Korea appears to have made its first full connection to the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 看来朝鲜已经首次与互联网完全接轨了。

sentences.english: The bottom of a connecting rail is provided with a plurality of notches for increasing flexibility.
sentences.chinese: 为了增加柔性，在连接轨底开有若干处切口。

sentences.english: Green-card and membership card making, and called couvention.
sentences.chinese: 实现绿色制卡和会员卡制作，与国际要求接轨。

sentences.english: Thus, there are more and more Chinese learn English asto catch up with the world.
sentences.chinese: 因此，越来越多的中国人为了与世界接轨而学习英语。
让小型种植户直接与市场接轨。

sentences.english: Article 3 The connection of special railway lines with national railways must be approved by the Ministry of Railways.
sentences.chinese: 第三条铁路专用线与国铁接轨必须经铁道部批准。

sentences.english: It helps get across to students real business-world issues.
sentences.chinese: 它能帮助学生与真实商业世界的议题接轨。

sentences.english: And the trend of reorganization inclines to be in line with the iron and steel enterprise of international scope.
sentences.chinese: 并且，与国际范围的钢铁企业并购重组的趋势接轨。

sentences.english: LINC So my group is called LINC, Learning Integration with our Community.
sentences.chinese: 我们组的项目叫，与社区的学习型接轨。

definition: (of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
to follow sb's example/to emulate/(of troops etc) to dress (come into alignment for parade formation)
abreast of modern developments/to keep up with the times/progressive/timely
to blend into/to integrate/to assimilate/to merge
